Easter not mis-timed a letter written out of the countrey to a friend in London concerning Easter-Day. Pell, John, 1611-1685.
[3], xi p.
Printed for Timothy Garthwait ..., London : 1664.
Written by John Pell. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
